From: Shlomi Fish (a.k.a “Rindolf”), hacker king of the Open content/Web 2.0 revolution (~2000-2014)
Summer Glau, Hollywood actress, known for her roles in Firefly, The Sarah Connor Chronicles, xkcd and Summerschool at the NSA, and who I suspect wishes to become the new hacker queen.

Sarah Michelle Gellar, Hollywood actress and producer, known for playing the fictional Buffy Summers, who was the hacker queen of the Web 1.0 revolution (~1997-2000), in the show Buffy the Vampire Slayer (BtVS). Ms. Gellar was also the frontwoman of the show, and Hollywood’s Alpha Female for that period.

Chuck Norris, martial artist, actor, and filmmaker , the inspiration and subject of many satirical “facts” about him, which have become a very powerful weapon, and also inspired my NSA “facts”, and later and earlier Humorous collections of facts.. Furthermore, Mr. Norris appears to be the current Alpha male of Hollywood.
Megan Fox, Hollywood actress, a very inspiring person, and someone whom I suspect wishes to become the next Hollywood Alpha female.
Jennifer Lawrence, Hollywood actress, a very inspiring person, and the present Alpha female of Hollywood.
General Keith B. Alexander, retired United States Army general, and former director of the National Security Agency (NSA).
Joss Whedon, Hollywood filmmaker (writer, director, etc.) who is notable here as the creator of BtVS, and Firefly, and a potential back-up director for Summerschool at the NSA.

CC::
Larry Wall, creator of the original “patch” program, the Usenet newsreader “rn”, the Perl programming language versions 1-to-6 and their “perl” implementations and the hacker king of the Open source/Usenet revolution (~1984-1997).
Edward Snowden, former contractor for the CIA and the NSA, who is notable for foolishly (but galantly) revealing a lot of internal claims of the NSA (NSA “intel”) and becoming a media hero and an outcast, (and someone who thought was under a constant threat) for what was likely mostly the product of delusional minds inside the NSA (or false/out-of-date data as intelligence data probably often goes).
All action heroes / hackers and geeks / amateurs of the world.

section.para: Your assistance is required in producing the feature film Summerschool at the NSA based on my original screenplay. The screenplay is made available under the Creative Commons Attribution License (CC-by) and its text is original. I have designated my recommendations for some the cast, and the film can be filmed mostly or entirely in a film studio at a relatively low cost.
Note however that I’ll be accepting of any productions whatsoever of the screenplay, including by enthusiastic independent film makers, on YouTube, and including releasing them as voiced animations.

I also neither, minds nor discourages, any hacks and deviations on the original screenplay, up to and including featuring Arnold Schwarzenegger sending Rihanna to kick the NSA’a ass, or Kermit the Frog doing the same with Fluttershy. (And you may consider them both as challenges).
What I do not want is that nothing is going to get done and that there won’t be any film - by anyone - in the forseeable future. So please get to it ASAP. I need you, and the world needs you.
If you create something, please mark it with the hashtag of #SummerNSA.

info.title: Implications Of The “Summerschool At The NSA” Films

section.para: The open content / Web 2.0 revolution has proven to be a blazing success and a source of decent or better income, esteem, and publicity for many individuals, small companies, large companies, and other organisations. While during the Web 1.0 era, information was hard to find, not reliable, and often hard to contribute to (what Prof. Lawrence Lessig calls "read only" vs. "read/write" in his book Remix, which I read and loved.), in the Web 2.0 era, one can build upon information, change it, enhance it, and perform many remixes as well as crossovers and “mashups”.

It is my belief that it was I, Shlomi Fish, was the “Hacker King” (a.k.a “Warrior King/Queen/Monarch” / The best-of-the-best-of-the-best / The Saladin / The Qoheleth / The John Galt /etc.) of that revolution. To quote what Quark said about the Grand Nagus: «Oh believe me, the Nagus has the greatest business mind in the entire Ferengi Alliance, always thinking ten, sometimes twenty steps ahead of everyone else.» and the kind of person who has the same ideas as everyone else only five years earlier and thus is named a lunatic.

Nevertheless, my reign as Hacker Monarch has reached its end with the writing of the screenplay, Summerschool at the NSA. The latter mixed and matched Judaism (Tanakh, Talmud, and Israelism), Buffy the Vampire Slayer, the xkcd web comic, the “99 problems” meme, the old “Publish or Perish” adage, the deeds and words of Saladin, open source and open content, some modern but not unthinkable technology, sex/love/romance/relationships, pop culture, and humour, and more into what was essentially a realism, Real Person Fiction, story featuring fictionalised versions of Sarah Michelle Gellar, Summer Glau, and General Keith Alexander as themselves. Furthemore, I ended up seeing it as my modernisation of Ayn Rand’s Atlas Shrugged novel (while still building upon it, referencing it and going against it), which was her magnus opus as Hacker Monarch.

Like Atlas Shrugged, “Summerschool at the NSA” was eventually understood to be my magnus opus, and I passed the baton to someone else, Summer Glau, and thus mostly concluded the open content/Web 2.0 revolution with a happy ending. Sic transit gloria mundi (STGM).
The formalities for concluding all that are:

listitem.para: Directing/producing the feature film or films “Summerschool at the NSA” in whatever format
Ms. Glau and I meeting somewhere and me asking her these questioned, which I'll give along with their answers:
Are you afraid to die? Answer: There is no correct answer.

Are you afraid to live? Answer: Maybe I have in the past, but I no longer am. I will do and say what seems right and good, whether people like it or not (while still being careful and avoiding being arrogant).
Do you wish to become the Hacker Monarch, while being fully aware of the implications of this role, and taking full responsibility for it? Answer: Yes, I do.

I will give her my cursed/blessed amulet of power, a plain brown ten-sided die, and ask her to determine what to do with it. I urge her not to lose it or destroy it (by seeing if it blends or whatever), since despite its low cost and mundaneness, it is a fine piece of engineering.
I will declare Summer Glau as the presiding Hacker Queen.

section.para: One implication of all this is that the worlds of the Academia, the software industry / open source / Internet / World-wide-web workers, and those of the “content”/culture creators, both the content industry and many hobbyists, amateur, independent and/or unsigned artists and content producers, who appeared to be mortal enemies at a point, will finally become united, for everyone’s benefits.
